sentences.cn: …一座塞满了毫无品位的家具的房子。

sentences.en: After the abstraction of the juice from the orange, only a tasteless pulp is left.
sentences.cn: 柳橙里的汁去掉後, 只剩下不可口的肉了.

sentences.en: After the abstraction of the juice from the orange, only a tasteless pulp was left.
sentences.cn: 橙子里的汁去掉后, 只剩下不可口的肉了.

sentences.en: He makes tasteless remarks about his co - workers.
sentences.cn: 他对他的同事滥发格调低下的议论.

sentences.en: How can you eat such tasteless food?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能吃下这么无味的食物呢？

sentences.en: I think that is the most vulgar and tasteless remark I ever heard in my life.
sentences.cn: 我觉得那是我平生听过的最粗俗不堪的话了。

sentences.en: I wouldn't call it art. It's just stupid and tasteless.
sentences.cn: 我不认为这是艺术。它简直无聊透顶，毫无品位。

sentences.en: If you eat too much, the food becomes tasteless.
Many considered this a crude and tasteless appeal.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为这是一种拙劣的、低级的呼吁.

sentences.en: Most foods are simply tasteless - roast beef is like soft rubber, an orange like unfla - vored gelatin.
sentences.cn: 大部分食物变得简直毫无味道 —— 烤牛肉好比软橡胶, 桔子像未加香料的明胶.

sentences.en: Old towns disfigured by tasteless new buildings.
sentences.cn: 古老的城镇被平庸的新建筑弄得很难看.

sentences.en: That oatmeal is so bland that it is tasteless.
The film is tasteless, vulgar and even badly shot.
sentences.cn: 这部电影毫无品位、庸俗不堪，甚至可以说拍得很烂。

sentences.en: The fish was mushy and tasteless.
sentences.cn: 鱼做得太烂了，没滋没味的。

sentences.en: The sparkle and bubble has gone out and it is a tasteless drink.
sentences.cn: 闪亮的泡沫已经化为乌有,这是淡而无味的酒.

sentences.en: We had mounds of tasteless rice.
sentences.cn: 我们有成堆成堆的淡而无味的米饭.

words.tran_cn: 雅观的；有鉴赏力的；趣味高雅的；有滋味的
无鉴赏力；格调低俗；没滋味

trans.tran_cn: 不可口的，俗气的，粗俗的
trans.tran_en: food or drink that is tasteless is unpleasant because it has no particular taste
